name: whodb
description: WhoDB is a next-generation, self-hostable database explorer with chat-style querying. It connects to Postgres, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, Redis and more, providing a modern interface for browsing schemas, running queries, and visualizing results.
features: Multi-database support: Connect to PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, Redis, and other popular databases.
Chat-style querying: Write queries using natural language or SQL with an intuitive chat interface.
Schema browser: Explore database structures, tables, columns, and relationships through an interactive tree view.
Query execution: Run SQL queries with syntax highlighting, auto-completion, and result visualization.
Data visualization: View query results as tables, charts, or graphs for better data understanding.
Connection management: Save and manage multiple database connections with secure credential storage.
Query history: Access previously executed queries for quick re-running or reference.
Export functionality: Export query results to CSV, JSON, or Excel formats for reporting or analysis.
Table editing: Modify data directly in the interface with inline editing and validation.
Performance monitoring: View query execution times and optimize slow queries with explain plans.
Dark mode: Switch between light and dark themes for comfortable viewing in different lighting conditions.
Responsive design: Access your databases from any device with a mobile-friendly interface.
